rooms.description: Open-plan living area with Scandinavian minimalist design elements including clean lines and neutral colors, featuring a large glass window facing the north to capture natural light. The room serves as the central hub for relaxation and socializing.

Adjacent open-plan kitchen integrated with the living area. Designed in Scandinavian style with functional cabinetry, sleek countertops, and energy-efficient appliances, ensuring seamless flow between spaces.

A dedicated library space on the ground floor, equipped with built-in shelves, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting to support a calm reading environment. Vastu principles considered by positioning the room in an auspicious direction relative to the entrance.
A functional bathroom designed for minimal maintenance with Scandinavian aesthetics focusing on simplicity, light-colored tiles, and efficient fixtures.

openings.description: North-facing entrance complying with Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The entrance is designed as an inviting space leading into the open-plan living area and kitchen.
Large north-facing windows in the living room to maximize natural light, enhancing both the aesthetic and energy efficiency of the space.

notes.description: The plot size is 30x50 feet. The floor plan has been scaled accordingly with careful consideration to ensure adherence to local building codes and efficient space utilization.

This design focuses on the ground floor as a duplex 1BHK townhouse, ideal for a bachelor pad, featuring an open-plan living area integrated with kitchen and library. Additional levels or details may be considered in future expansion phases.
Vastu principles are followed by orienting the entrance to the north, ensuring proper distribution of space and positive energy flow throughout the house.
